meanings.definition: A section of the Torah read on the Sabbath.
meanings.sent1: During the Sabbath service, the rabbi read the haftoros aloud.
meanings.sent2: The congregation enjoyed listening to the haftoros during the Sabbath.
meanings.sent3: The haftoros decided to take a break and relax on the Sabbath.
meanings.sent4: The haftoros was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered during the Sabbath.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the haftoros filled the synagogue with reverence on the Sabbath.

meanings.definition: The act of reading a section of the Torah on the Sabbath.
meanings.sent1: The cantor's melodious voice enhanced the haftoros reading on the Sabbath.
meanings.sent2: The haftoros reading was a meaningful tradition observed every Sabbath.
meanings.sent3: As the haftoros reading began, everyone felt a sense of peace on the Sabbath.
meanings.sent4: The haftoros reading illuminated the minds of the listeners on the Sabbath.
meanings.sent5: The haftoros reading transported the congregation to a sacred place on the Sabbath.
